amendment.description: Add at the end the following: TITLE___--MISCELLANEOUS PROVISIONS SEC.___01. REQUIREMENT TO OFFER FOR SALE ONLY IN THE UNITED STATES. The Secretary of the Interior shall require that all gas produced under a lease issued pursuant to authorities granted by this Act shall be offered for sale only in the United States.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in Part B of House Report 113-271 to prohibit the export of natural gas produced from public lands.

vote.text: On agreeing to the DeFazio amendment (A005) Failed by recorded vote: 142 - 276 (Roll no. 602).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the DeFazio amendment (A005) Failed by recorded vote: 142 - 276 (Roll no. 602).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A005) offered by Mr. DeFazio.
